mapper.select: select program_id, program_subject, start_date, end_date, approval_date, approval_flg from programs where organization_id = #{organization_id};
mapper.insert: insert into programs(organization_id, program_id, program_subject, type_id, start_date, end_date, target_amount, purpose, summary, content, organization_url, bank_name, account, phone_number, representative) values (#{organization_id}, #{program_id}, #{program_subject}, #{type_id}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{target_amount}, #{purpose}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{organization_url}, #{bank_name}, #{account}, #{phone_number}, #{representative})
